Body:
I want to develop a program which can differentiate between CVC, VCV, and CV syllable types.

I'm having trouble knowing when vowel has ended in CVC and CV syllables.

I want to read more about it. Are there any websites, papers, or books that would be recommended reading for this task?
Title: Computationally differentiating between CVC, VCV and CV syllables

LastEditedUser.AboutMe:
Travelling armchair linguist.

Never studied in an institution but read books and web with probably more breadth than depth.

Always on the road surviving in a strange foreign language, currently Mongolian and Mandarin Chinese.

And I collect dictionaries.
